service.title: Service Title Example
service.message:
all text on this template is controlled by xml.

This is html text. This means you can use LINKS,

colored text,

pictures and many diferent things using html.
Scrollbars are enabled whenever needed. Also scrollwheel control is supported both for windows and mac!
